item.title: My Favorite Animated Short Films
item.author: Era Dewan
item.description: I been watching these short animated videos on YouTube. Many of them are silent (no dialogue). They’re so well-made. Some made me cry. Some are more creepy, dystopian vibes with social commentary. It’s a whole movie experience in under 10 minutes. Made me cry One Small Step (appreciate your silent supporters) ***hella tears Umbrella (have empathy for others) Let’s Eat (Asian mother and daughter relationship) Hair Love (family) WiNDUP (hospitalization) First Born (siblings) Dystopian Best Friend (addicted to a virtual friends product, themes of loneliness & addiction) ***only 5 minutes but 10/10 impact Less Than Human (zombies but it’s cute) Funny Yes-People (different meanings of “yes”) Alarm All You Can Eat Misc The Twins Destiny
